Articles.Content: would it be possible to have ksp at 4k or would that take up too much ram?

Shouldn't affect RAM usage. If it doesn't show up in the available resoultions in game, try editing settings.cfg. Look for these two lines:

SCREEN_RESOLUTION_WIDTH = 1920

SCREEN_RESOLUTION_HEIGHT = 1080

And adjust them to:

SCREEN_RESOLUTION_WIDTH = 3840

SCREEN_RESOLUTION_HEIGHT = 2160

Not sure this will work, but it should. You may have to adjust the UI size as well to get things looking right.
Don't do this on a screen too small to support it, it's not a good idea.
